Method.name: TestEmptyParametersList
Method.Implementation: set a = ##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New() set request = ##class(VKReader.Requests.RequestMaker).RequestArrayToQueryString("users.get", a) set result = "users.get?v=" _ ##class(VKReader.Requests.RequestMaker).%GetParameter("APIVersion") do $$$AssertEquals(request, result, "In case of empty parameters' list method should quit with only api version parameter.")

Method.name: TestUsualBehavior
Method.Implementation:
set a = ##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New()
do a.SetAt("val1", "key1") do a.SetAt("val2", "key2")
set result = "users.get?" _ "key1=val1&key2=val2&" _ "v=" _ ##class(VKReader.Requests.RequestMaker).%GetParameter("APIVersion") set request = ##class(VKReader.Requests.RequestMaker).RequestArrayToQueryString("users.get", a) do $$$AssertEquals(request, result, "Testing usual behavior...")
